comments.text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:5.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/5.0
Build ID: 20110615151330

Steps to reproduce:

Right clicked on any folder in folder pane.


Actual results:

Run Filters on Folder did not show up as one of the items...


Expected results:

It would be nice if right clicking on a folder in the folder pane also brought up 'Run Filters on Folder' as an action. 

Similarly, right clicking on any message in the message list ought to bring up 'Run Filters on Message.'
comments.author: from.mozilla.den@ertem.com

User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:5.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/5.0
Build ID: 20110615151330

Steps to reproduce:

Right clicked on any folder in folder pane.


Actual results:

Run Filters on Folder did not show up as one of the items...


Expected results:

It would be nice if right clicking on a folder in the folder pane also brought up 'Run Filters on Folder' as an action. 

Similarly, right clicking on any message in the message list ought to bring up 'Run Filters on Message.'
